epic.title: TypeScript Project Setup
epic.description: Initial TypeScript project setup and configuration.

tasks.title: Install dependencies
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs Node.js dependencies installed.

## Tasks
- [ ] Run npm install
- [ ] Verify TypeScript compiles
- [ ] Document Node version requirement

## Acceptance Criteria
- `npm run build` succeeds

tasks.title: Set up Jest testing
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs automated testing.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create src/__tests__/ directory
- [ ] Configure ts-jest
- [ ] Write first passing test
- [ ] Add coverage reporting

## Acceptance Criteria
- `npm test` runs and passes

tasks.title: Configure ESLint and Prettier
tasks.description:
## Context
Consistent code style improves readability.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create .eslintrc.js
- [ ] Create .prettierrc
- [ ] Add lint-staged for pre-commit

## Acceptance Criteria
- `npm run lint` passes
- `npm run format` works

tasks.title: Configure GitHub Actions CI
tasks.description:
## Context
CI ensures code quality on every push.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create .github/workflows/ci.yml
- [ ] Add build, test, lint steps
- [ ] Configure Node.js matrix

## Acceptance Criteria
- CI runs on push and PR
- All checks pass
